mbean.description: An instance of Resin running in a JVM.

ref-list.title: Servers
ref-list.description: The servers that are active within this JVM.

ref.title: ThreadPool
ref.description: The ThreadPool manages all threads used by Resin.

attribute.name: ServerId
attribute.description: The server id used when starting this version of Resin, the value of `-server id'.

attribute.name: ResinHome
attribute.description: The Resin home directory used when starting this instance of Resin. This is the location of the Resin program files.

attribute.name: ServerRoot
attribute.description: The server root directory used when starting this instance of Resin. This is the root directory of the web server files.

attribute.name: ConfigFile
attribute.description: The configuration file used when starting this instance of Resin, the value of `-config file'.

attribute.name: InitialStartTime
attribute.description: The time that this instance was first started.

attribute.name: StartTime
attribute.description: The time that this instance was last started or restarted.
